holidays.title: World Population Day
holidays.description: A holiday that’s dedicated to focusing on the importance of population issues.

holidays.title: All American Pet Photo Day
holidays.description: Snap, snap, snap! Give your pets the paparazzi treatment on this day.

holidays.title: Bowdler's Day
holidays.description: Today is the birthday of the man whose name has become synonymous with censorship, Thomas Bowdler.

holidays.title: Captive Nations Week
holidays.description: This day’s observance aims to raise public awareness about the oppression faced by nations across the globe.

holidays.title: Celebration of the Golden Spurs
holidays.description: It’s another joyous Flemish Celebration of the Golden Spurs today. Celebrate with us today!

holidays.title: Cheer Up the Lonely Day
holidays.description: Organize a get-together today to help get the word out and spread the spirit of friendliness!

holidays.title: Day of the Flemish Community
holidays.description: Let’s go back in history to celebrate the Battle of the Golden Spurs.

holidays.title: International Essential Oils Day
holidays.description: This aromatic day recognizes the benefits of essential oils for humanity.

holidays.title: Naadam Holiday
holidays.description: Participate in Mongolian traditional sports to commemorate one of their most important festivals.

holidays.title: National 7-Eleven Day
holidays.description: Beware of brain freeze as you indulge in Slurpees on National 7-Eleven Day!

holidays.title: National Blueberry Muffin Day
holidays.description: Kick-start your day with a delicious blueberry muffin and a hot cup of coffee.

holidays.title: National Culture and Senior Citizens Day
holidays.description: Respect the elderly and appreciate their contributions on National Culture and Senior Citizens Day.

holidays.title: National Mojito Day
holidays.description: What's better on a hot summer’s day than to cool off with this classic minty cocktail?

holidays.title: National Polyphenol Day
holidays.description: On National Polyphenol Day, we commemorate the birthday of Dr. Gundry, a cardiothoracic surgeon.

holidays.title: National Rainier Cherry Day
holidays.description: Tasty and high in nutrition, these summertime sweet treats are everyone’s favorite.

holidays.title: National Swimming Pool Day
holidays.description: There’s no such thing as the perfect pool day… or is there? (Swim) suit up and celebrate!

holidays.title: World Benzodiazepine Awareness Day
holidays.description: Be informed about these psychoactive drugs and their side effects this World Benzodiazepine Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Alessia Cara’s Birthday
holidays.description: We look at the rise of this Grammy-winning Canadian pop singer, songwriter, and record producer.

holidays.title: Lil Kim’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate the stylish and brilliant role model of many great female rappers that followed her.

holidays.title: Lisa Rinna’s Birthday
holidays.description: This versatile actress has become a household name and has acted her way into people’s hearts.

holidays.title: Samantha Fekete’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented YouTube star has also made her foray into acting and is garnering much fame.
